name: monovaryOn_univ

  simp [Monovary, MonovaryOn]

  fun _ _ hij => hf (hg.reflect_lt hij).le

name: MonovaryOn.comp_monotoneOn_right
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : Type u_3
β : Type u_4
γ : Type u_5
inst✝² : Preorder α
inst✝¹ : LinearOrder β
inst✝ : Preorder γ
f : ι → α
g : ι → β
g' : β → γ
s : Set ι

hg : MonotoneOn g' (Set.image g s)
⊢ MonovaryOn f (Function.comp g' g) s
decl:

    MonovaryOn f (g' ∘ g) s := fun _ hi _ hj hij =>
  h hi hj <| hg.reflect_lt (mem_image_of_mem _ hi) (mem_image_of_mem _ hj) hij

name: Monovary.symm

β : Type u_4

⊢ Monovary g f
decl:

protected theorem Monovary.symm (h : Monovary f g) : Monovary g f := fun _ _ hf =>
  le_of_not_lt fun hg => hf.not_le <| h hg
